text: Kapena akwete ŵanganyao akwawanganya (ni Allah), ŵaŵalamulile mu dini yanganachisya Allah, soni lingaŵaga liloŵe lya chilekanganyo (lyalyalongolele kala lyangapa ilagasyo yekulungwa ikaŵeje ku Kiyama), kungaajiilanyidwe chilikati chao, soni chisimu ŵalupuso tachipata ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
